item.title: VMworld 2021 Sessions for Securing and Managing Multi-Cloud
item.author: Author
item.description: VMworld 2021 is coming up. Multi-cloud and security are some of the most discussed topics this year so let’s explore some of the sessions that you might be interested in attending to learn about how you can manage and secure multi-cloud environments using vRealize Automation! Register for VMworld 2021 VMworld 2021 is virtual again and the general pass is FREE! Register here! Tech+ Pass Only Sessions Tech+ Pass costs $299 but it includes all the general sessions plus enhanced technical deep-dive sessions.
